fullText:
Greater Turning

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Cleric, Channel Divinity: turn undead class feature
Benefit: Whenever you miss a target when using turn undead, the target is pushed a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. The target takes no damage and is not immobilized.

Published in Dragon Magazine 371, page(s) 8.
